name: Mimiq Doubler
details:
Studio-quality Double-tracked SoundsThe TC Electronic Mimiq Doubler effects pedal puts the sound of your favorite multi-tracked guitar lines onto your pedalboard. With a tap of your toe, the Mimiq Doubler instantly simulates all the intricacies and imperfections that create the massive tones of double-tracked guitars. Controls for Tightness, Dry, Effect, and Dubs dial the sound in for a tighter sound, a bit looser for a more organic feel, or even a sound with up to 4 tracks simultaneously. And the Mimiq is an especially big hit at Sweetwater for its powerful stereo I/O.
http://www.tcelectronic.com/mimiq-doubler/
